ship walk through.title: Nieuw Statendam Christmas Cruise VLOG #5 - SAN JUAN, Pool Time, and Old San Juan in the Evening
ship walk through.description: We vlog the fourth day of our 7-day Christmas Cruise onboard the Nieuw Statendam. We arrive in Old San Juan and spend some time first on the quiet ship, before exploring Old San Juan in the evening. ▬

ship walk through.title: Embarkation Day for Our Group Cruise | HAL Nieuw Statendam
ship walk through.description: It's Cruise Day, and it's time four our 2nd Group Cruise - this time on Holland America's Nieuw Statendam with 64 guests! Join us for our 7 day adventure into the Caribbean. ▬ Contents of this video ▬

ship walk through.title: Holland America Cruise Vlog | New Years Cruise 2022 | Nieuw Statendam | Day 1

ship walk through.title: Holland America Cruise Vlog | SEA DAY | Day 5 | Nieuw Statendam
